text: Luiz de Almeida is a weightlifter from Brazil. Almeida competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born on 20 August 1941.Luiz de Almeida == References == Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian weightlifters Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from Bahia
title: Luiz de Almeida
